mdRecord.dcterms:title: Queen Bess corset and skirt supporter: this is by far the best corset and skirt supporter ever made and is warranted in every particular : manufactured only by the Worcester Corset Co., Worcester, Mass
To the ladies!
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 sheet ([2] p.) : col. ill. ; 23 x 12 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text on verso: To the ladies! We can confidently recommend this Supporter as far superior to anything of the kind in the market, for the following reasons: ... For sale by Loeb Brothers, Staunton, Va. [original]
Image: two women, showing front and back views of the corset. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Worcester Corset Co. (Worcester, Mass.)
Loeb Brothers (Staunton, Va.)
